title: Which benefits from USD appreciation in short run

content.question: Which of the following is most likely to benefit from an appreciation in the United States dollar in the short run?

choices.label: United States investors holding European bonds
Importers in foreign countries seeking raw inputs at a lower price
United States exporters selling capital equipment
United States tourists traveling to foreign countries
European consumers buying United States goods

content.answer: United States tourists traveling to foreign countries

unit.text: 6: Open Economy - International Trade and Finance

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Identify an economic concept, principle, or model illustrated by an example.
